component.name: BusySpinnerExample
component.script:
sub init() m.busyspinner = m.top.findNode("exampleBusySpinner") m.busyspinner.poster.observeField("loadStatus", "showspinner") m.busyspinner.poster.uri = "pkg:/images/busyspinner.png" end sub
sub showspinner() if(m.busyspinner.poster.loadStatus = "ready") centerx = (1280 - m.busyspinner.poster.bitmapWidth) / 2 centery = (720 - m.busyspinner.poster.bitmapHeight) / 2 m.busyspinner.translation = [ centerx, centery ]
m.busyspinner.visible = true end if end sub
